preface.title: Preface
preface.para: This document describes the tool set for sourcing books stored in git and SVN, authoring, including Oxygen and the maven clouddocs plugin, and creating output for review.

OpenStack and Rackspace share a XML-based tool chain to generate documentation artifacts from DocBook and WADL source. The major components of this tool chain are:
The tools and build logic to generate documentation artifacts.
A customized version of the oXygen XML Editor for creating XML source files.
The tools and build logic to generate documentation artifacts are implemented as a Maven plugin. Apache Maven is a build automation tool. Maven reads a project's configuration from a file, downloads any required dependencies, such as the tools required to perform the build, and then proceeds to produce the artifacts specified.

section.title: Intended Audience
section.para: This guide assists writers and developers who use these writing tools to create documentation for OpenStack and Rackspace.
